code: import{createFetchHook}from'../fetch-hook.base';import{forumService}from'../../services/forum/Forum';export var useFetchForumSections=function useFetchForumSections(){var section=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:-1;var refresh=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return createFetchHook(function(){return forumService.getSections(section);},refresh);};export var useFetchForumSectionByID=function useFetchForumSectionByID(sectionID){var refresh=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return createFetchHook(function(){return forumService.getSectionByID(sectionID);},sectionID+refresh);};
